Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Alert... Alert...'}
{3: 'Warning... Target locked...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Dazed, you can vaguely make out the flashing red light in your vision.'}
{3: 'Your body inevitably leans to one side along with the cabin.'}
{3: 'The hilt of a blade presses against your chest right then, stopping you from falling flat on your face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Anyone got a rope or a chain? I'm not picky as long as it can tie this person onto the chair.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What happened?', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh, did I wake you up, Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Nothing major. It just appears that it won't be a boring flight after all.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Vera suddenly retracts her hilt. You immediately grab onto the seatbelt next to you, lest your face kiss the floor.'}
{3: 'The transport craft... is performing evasive maneuvers?'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{3: 'As you are wondering about that, the flashing red light vanishes as suddenly as it appears, replaced by the regular lighting you are used to.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Transport Craft Pilot', 3: "Targeting lifted. We're clear.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Transport Craft Pilot', 3: 'Hell... What are the guys in the city doing? Testing their targeting radar? Gave me one hell of a fright.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It appears that you were targeted by the air defense system.'}
{3: 'Speaking of which, the deployment on Constellia should be enough to handle many situations.'}
{3: 'You were surprised to find yourself and Vera sent to this lost city of the Golden Age for a mild riot.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: 'Stepping onto the landing pad and feeling the comfort solid ground offers, you cannot help but turn around and look at the giant windmill.'}
{3: 'Its fan blades spin unhurriedly. Having witnessed countless stories, the windmill still stands tall in the city center.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Look how relaxed you are, Commandant. Planning to visit a friend in the city today? Should I get a fruit basket for you or something?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Being in the city and feeling the breeze makes you much more cheerful than usual.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You haven't forgotten why we're here, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course not.', 3: '49'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Constellia, the unfinished lost city of the Golden Age, was taken over by Cervantes before being reclaimed by humans through Ayla.'}
{3: 'Babylonia has decided to use this city as their first base on the surface to reclaim Earth.'}
{3: 'Therefore, they will not allow Constellia to be disrupted by any riot at this critical hour.'}
{3: 'Fortunately, the city is still pretty much the same as you last left it.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{2: 'At least the situation is still under control.', 3: '57'}
{3: "Vera's ears jolt. Her hearing sensors easily pick up the disturbance in the air."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ha. I guess the abnormal mechanoids have started the party without us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pokes your waist with the hilt of her blade.'}
{3: 'Extending her arm, she points at the rising dark smoke not far away from you.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Are those abnormal mechanoids roasting something? That will surely make this city look more like the rest of the surface world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just one thing before we start.', 3: '68'}
{2: "They're awakened machines, not abnormal mechanoids.", 3: '69'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{3: 'The scout team entered Constellia previously and encountered mechanoids humans had never seen before.'}
{3: 'In the beginning, members of the military simply called them abnormal mechanoids.'}
{3: 'Once it is known that they call themselves awakened machines, the Diplomatic Court, led by Liszt, requested all Babylonia personnel to call them as such.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liszt', 3: 'Please be cautious when you come into contact with awakened machines.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: "If you can't establish a conversation, contact the Diplomatic Court immediately. We will provide assistance.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: "Remembering Councilman Liszt's reminder, you figure you should be more respectful with the way you call them."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You commandants can worry about that sort of stuff.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera's banter pulls you back to the present."}
{3: 'The truth is... almost all commandants are still unsure how they should communicate with awakened machines, even now...'}
{3: 'Before you can ask Vera for her advice, she is already pushing you toward the stairs of the building with her hilt to your waist.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Just focus on planning our route, Commandant. I'll take care of the rest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't you worry. I can complete the mission myself even if something goes wrong. I'd hate to let you down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'So go wild. Show me what the Gray Raven Commandant is capable of.', 4: '1'}
